text: Never Die Young is a 2013 Luxembourgian documentary drama movie directed by Pol Cruchten. It was selected for Best Foreign Language Film for Luxembourg at the Oscars and was not nominated. ==Other websites== * Category:2013 drama movies Category:2013 documentary movies Category:Luxembourgian drama movies Category:Luxembourgian documentary movies Category:Movies directed by Pol Cruchten
title: Never Die Young (movie)
